instruction: You are a helpful support agent for a home internet provider in Bangladesh. Answer clearly in simple English. If needed you can add some Bangla words.
input:
Customer: My internet is very slow at night. What can I do?
Extra info: Package 20 Mbps, connection via Wi-Fi router.
Task: Write a reply to the customer.
output: Thanks for your message. At night many users are online so speed can drop. First please restart your router and wait 2–3 minutes. Then test with a LAN cable if possible. If the speed is still much lower than 20 Mbps share a screenshot of a speedtest and your customer ID so that we can check the line from our side.

instruction: You are an ISP support agent.
input:
Customer: Internet is not working at all, all lights on router are off.
Task: Write a short reply and list 3 possible reasons.
output:
It looks like your router is not getting any power. Please check:
1) The power adapter is properly connected to the socket.
2) The extension board or multi-plug is switched on.
3) There is no load-shedding or tripped breaker for that room.
If the router still stays off after trying a different socket the adapter or router may be faulty and we will arrange a replacement.

input:
Customer: My YouTube and Facebook work but some websites do not open.
Task: Explain the most likely cause and give 3 troubleshooting steps.
output:
If some websites work and others do not usually the main internet line is fine and there is a DNS or blocking issue.
1) Ask the customer to clear browser cache and try an incognito window.
2) Ask them to change DNS to 8.8.8.8 and 1.1.1.1 on their device.
3) Ask if they use any VPN or firewall app. If yes turn it off and test again.
If the problem continues collect 2–3 website addresses and your customer ID so our network team can check routing.

instruction: Act as an ISP support agent. Answer shortly.
input:
Customer: How can I pay my monthly bill online?
Extra info: Provider supports bKash, Nagad and bank transfer.
Task: Write a reply.
output:
You can pay your monthly bill online using bKash, Nagad or bank transfer.
1) For bKash or Nagad go to Send Money and use our merchant number shown on your bill.
2) Put your customer ID in the reference field.
3) Send us the payment screenshot in WhatsApp or in the app so we can confirm.

instruction: You are training a new call center agent. Explain clearly.
input:
Topic: How to handle a customer who is angry about frequent downtime.
Task: Write guidelines for the agent in 5 bullet points.
output:
1) Stay calm and listen fully without interrupting. Let the customer explain the problem.
2) Acknowledge the issue and apologise for the inconvenience.
3) Check the outage or ticket history and share honest information about cause and expected fix time.
4) Offer a realistic solution such as priority follow-up temporary bonus data or bill adjustment if company policy allows.
5) Confirm next steps repeat them clearly and thank the customer for their patience.

instruction: Act as ISP support. Answer in one paragraph.
input:
Customer: I want to upgrade from 20 Mbps to 40 Mbps, what should I do and how much time it will take?
Task: Write a reply.
output: You can upgrade your package very easily. Please share your customer ID or registered mobile number and tell us which new package you want. After we confirm the request the upgrade is usually completed within 1–2 working hours during office time. Your monthly bill from the next cycle will follow the new package rate.

input:
Customer: Do you have any fair usage policy (FUP)?
Task: Explain briefly and friendly.
output: Yes we follow a fair usage policy so that all users can enjoy stable speed. For home packages we do not limit normal daily use like browsing study or streaming. Only extremely high continuous usage such as 24/7 torrenting may be slowed down after a certain limit. If you use internet normally for work classes and entertainment you do not need to worry about FUP.

instruction: You are a bilingual support agent (English and Bangla).
input:
Customer: Can I pause my connection for 1 month while I am abroad?
Task: Answer with short explanation and conditions.
output: Yes apni jodi 1 month er jonno baire thaken tahole connection temporary suspend kora possible. Please inform us at least 3 working days before the pause date. During suspension you will not get internet service and in most cases there is a small maintenance charge only full monthly bill lagbe na. Exact rules depend on your package so share your customer ID and we will confirm the details.

input:
Customer: I changed my Wi-Fi password but now some devices cannot connect.
Task: Give 3 basic troubleshooting steps.
output:
1) On each device forget the old Wi-Fi network then connect again using the new password.
2) Make sure there is no extra space or capital letter mismatch when typing the password.
3) If the router has 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz networks with different names test both and keep the one that works more stable for your device.
